import React, { Component } from 'react'; export default class ManageClient extends Component { render() { setTimeout(function() { if(Client.find().fetch()==""){ } else{ var flag=2; var item = Client.find().fetch(); $.map(item,function(val){ if(flag % 2 == 0){ if(val.is_active==0){ $("#user_list_docs").append(''+ ''+val.client_id+''+ ''+val.client_company_name+''+ ''+val.client_phone_number+''+ 'Deactive'+ '
'+ ''+ '

'+ ''+ '

'+ ''+ '

'+ ''+ '
'+ ''+ ''); } } flag++; }); } }, 1000); return (
